title: Pset_FlowInstrumentTypeThermometer
description: A device that reads and displays a temperature value at a point.

ThermometerType.title: ThermometerType
ThermometerType.description: Identifies the means by which temperature is displayed.

DisplaySize.title: DisplaySize
DisplaySize.description: The physical size of the display. In the case of a stem thermometer, this will be the length of the stem. For a dial thermometer, it will be the diameter of the dial.
